Desc.entry: Aims to facilitate trade investment between organisations from Sheffield and China. The network hosts events, seminars and meet the buyer events to encourage trade and investment with China. In recent years Sheffield companies have become increasingly active in the Chinese market. The network works to provide guidance and support for Sheffield companies, who face many challenging economic, political and cultural barriers when looking to enter the Chinese market. The network is lead by a steering group of interested parties which includes; Creative Sheffield, Sheffield University, Sheffield Hallam University, HSBC, South Yorkshire International Trade Centre, Sheffield Chinese Community Association and Yorkshire Forward.
